attributes.action: Ignore all petitions that would not be sanctioned by majority of the Briish people i.e. build a mega mosque
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ignore epetitions dealing with issues that are of no concern to the majority of the British people and the customary way of life and/or foreign issues that are not in Britain's interests.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
